data.title: Presenting Norma Fox Mazer. by HOLTZE, Sally Holmes.: Fine Hardcover (1987) Signed by Author(s)
data.meta_description: ISBN: 9780805782042 - Signed by Author(s) - 1st Edition - Hardcover - Twayne, Boston - 1987 - Condition: Fine - Near Fine - Number 529 in the Twayne United States author series. First printing. INSCRIBED by the author. Also, laid in is a signed note on the author's personal stationary. Fine in a dust jacket that would also be fine save that it is price clipped. - Presenting Norma Fox Mazer.
data.text:
Terms of Sale:

Grendel Books, ABAA/ILAB, 87 Mulberry Street, Springfield, MA 01105, (413) 301-8736, grendel.javanet@rcn.com, www.grendelbooks.com. All listings are subject to prior sale. Please contact us to reserve books in advance. We will hold books for ten days, pending payment.

All orders should be prepaid. Payment may be made by personal check, money order, credit card, or PayPal. Institutions can be billed to suit their needs.

Books may be returned within 10 days for whatever reason, provided

their cond...

More Information

Shipping Terms:

Orders usually ship within 2 business days. Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book order is heavy or oversize, we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is required.

Domestic orders are shipped via the U.S. Postal Service (Priority

Mail) starting at $15.00 for the first book. Shipping cost may be slightly higher depending on weight of book and shipping destination. Media Mail shipping rate is also available: $6.00 for the first book and $2.00 for each additional. Overseas orders are billed at cost.
